text.config.rainbowbridge-config.title: Rainbow Bridge Options
tooltip.rainbowbridge.collar.info:
Makes your tamed pet invulnerable.
Collared pets appear in the Roster.
Sneak + right-click a block to set home.
Hold ALT to view home block.
tooltip.rainbowbridge.roster.info:
Tracks pets with Collars applied.
Sneak + right-click to set the default home point for pets.
Hold ALT to view default home block.
tooltip.rainbowbridge.ocarina.info:
Calls your pet to you.
Sneak + right-click to assign ocarina to pet.
Once applied, Sneak + right-click on assigned pet to send home
